Bangkai Babi Ditemukan di Sungai Bederah Medan Capai Ratusan
05 Nov 2019, 19:23 by Budi Warsito
Medan - Warga sekitar Sungai Bederah, Medan Marelan, Sumatera Utara (Sumut), mengeluhkan bau yang berasal dari sampah dan bangkai babi yang ditemukan di sungai itu. Camat Medan Marelan M Yunus mengatakan ada ratusan bangkai babi yang ditemukan.
"Jadi kami sejak dari pagi mengadakan pemantauan. Kalau yang kami pantau, ada ratusan," ujar M Yunus di Medan, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Dia mengklaim tak ada warga sekitar lokasi ditemukannya bangkai babi yang membuang bangkai hewan ke sungai tersebut. Dia menduga bangkai itu hanyut terbawa arus mengingat sungai tersebut melintasi beberapa kabupaten.
"Khususnya babi yang mati. Kalau wilayah kami tidak ada membuang ke sungai. Aliran sungai ini dari beberapa kabupaten hingga mengalir wilayah kami," terangnya.

Pork Carcass Found in Bederah River Medan Reaches Hundreds
05 Nov 2019, 19:23 by Budi Warsito
Medan - Residents around the Bederah River, Medan Marelan, North Sumatra (North Sumatra), complained of the smell coming from the garbage and dead pigs found in the river. Medan Sub-District Chief Marelan M Yunus said there were hundreds of dead pigs found.
"So we have been monitoring since the morning. If what we monitor, there are hundreds," said M Yunus in Medan, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
He claimed there were no residents around the location of the discovery of pig carcasses that dumped animal carcasses into the river. He suspects that the carcass was washed away because the river crosses several regencies.
"Especially pigs that die. If our region does not have to throw into the river. The river flow from several districts to flow into our region," he explained.
